channel.title: Reproducible Finance with R
channel.description: Exploring reproducible finance with the R statistical computing environment.

item.title: Visualizing Asset Returns
item.dc:creator: Jonathan Regenstein
item.description: In this POST we take a closer look at the individual assets which compose a portfolio. The motivation is to make sure we have scrutinized our assets before they get into our portfolio, as once the portfolio has been constructed, it is tempting to keep the analysis at the portfolio level

item.title: Asset Contribution to Portfolio Volatility
item.dc:creator: Jonathan Regenstein
item.description: In this post we explore breaking total portfolio volatility into its constituent parts and investigate how each asset contributes to the volatility.

item.title: Welcome to Reproducible Blog
item.dc:creator: Nora Jones
item.description: Welcome to our new blog, Reproducible Blog. We hope you enjoy reading what we have to say!
